comments.text:
Huw, I much appreciated this video! As a newcomer to your channel, I have looked for but not found a simple comparison of your multiple books, to understand when and how they match things I'm needing to learn. So this was greatly beneficial!
Would you post a video or other information (or the link if you've already done it) to explain the differences between your other books as well and how/when to use them best? - "Grow Food for Free," "The Vegetable Grower's Handbook," "Veg in One Bed," & "The Permaculture Garden"?
